filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description:
FiftyFlip.sendFunds(address,uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#370-378) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- success = paidUser.send(amount) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#371)
FiftyFlip.play(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#184-239) uses a weak PRNG: "jackpotRes = random % JACKPOT_MODULO (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#200)"

Reentrancy in FiftyFlip.wager(bool,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#126-181):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(donate_amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#166)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bet.amount = amount (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#169)
	FiftyFlip.bets (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#43) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FiftyFlip.clearProcessedBet(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#401-416)
	- FiftyFlip.getBetInfo(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#313-318)
	- FiftyFlip.play(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#184-239)
	- FiftyFlip.refund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#258-267)
	- FiftyFlip.sendRefund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#356-367)
	- FiftyFlip.wager(bool,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#126-181)
	- bet.blockNumber = block.number (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#170)
	FiftyFlip.bets (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#43) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FiftyFlip.clearProcessedBet(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#401-416)
	- FiftyFlip.getBetInfo(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#313-318)
	- FiftyFlip.play(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#184-239)
	- FiftyFlip.refund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#258-267)
	- FiftyFlip.sendRefund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#356-367)
	- FiftyFlip.wager(bool,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#126-181)
	- bet.betMask = bMask (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#171)
	FiftyFlip.bets (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#43) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FiftyFlip.clearProcessedBet(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#401-416)
	- FiftyFlip.getBetInfo(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#313-318)
	- FiftyFlip.play(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#184-239)
	- FiftyFlip.refund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#258-267)
	- FiftyFlip.sendRefund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#356-367)
	- FiftyFlip.wager(bool,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#126-181)
	- bet.player = player (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#172)
	FiftyFlip.bets (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#43) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FiftyFlip.clearProcessedBet(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#401-416)
	- FiftyFlip.getBetInfo(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#313-318)
	- FiftyFlip.play(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#184-239)
	- FiftyFlip.refund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#258-267)
	- FiftyFlip.sendRefund(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#356-367)
	- FiftyFlip.wager(bool,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#126-181)

FiftyFlip.setBotAddress(address) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#117-119) should emit an event for: 
	- autoPlayBot = autoPlayBotAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#118)

FiftyFlip.withdrawBotFee(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#292-310) should emit an event for: 
	- devFeeSize -= withdrawAmount (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#308)

FiftyFlip.withdrawDevFee(address,uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#270-289) should emit an event for: 
	- devFeeSize -= withdrawAmount (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#287)

FiftyFlip.constructor(address,address,address).autoPlayBotAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#77) lacks a zero-check on :
		- autoPlayBot = autoPlayBotAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#81)

FiftyFlip.constructor(address,address,address).whaleAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#76) lacks a zero-check on :
		- whale = whaleAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#82)

FiftyFlip.setBotAddress(address).autoPlayBotAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#117) lacks a zero-check on :
		- autoPlayBot = autoPlayBotAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#118)

FiftyFlip.constructor(address,address,address).secretSignerAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#78) lacks a zero-check on :
		- secretSigner = secretSignerAddress (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#83)

Reentrancy in FiftyFlip.wager(bool,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#126-181):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(donate_amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#166)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalAmountToWhale += donate_amount (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#167)

Reentrancy in FiftyFlip.wager(bool,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#126-181):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(donate_amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#166)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Wager(ticketID,bet.amount,bet.blockNumber,bet.betMask,bet.player) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_030.sol#174-180)
